document_data.name: Naerzil
document_data.mainbody: '''Naerzil''' was a [[Red Wizard]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: He had the same superiors as [[Thauvas Zlorn]], a fellow Red Wizard.
document_data.Abilities: He was one of four [[mage]]s using at least one [[spell]] to trap [[Caladnei]] in rope-like bindings of flame.
document_data.History:
Narvo was one of four Red Wizards that [[teleport]]ed into the meeting place of the [[Rightful Conspiracy]] in [[Marsember]] after the raid by the [[War Wizards]] of [[Cormyr]] during the early spring of the {{YearlinkName|1373}}. He trapped Caladnei using a spell that created rope-like bindings of flame. On arrival, he was greeted by Thauvas Zlorn, who told him not to harm Caladnei for they had use for her; Narvo responded by warning him that he had outlived his usefulness and his prospects at remaining alive were dim, thus, he was not interested in Thauvas' input.

In response, Thauvas quietly killed him with an unknown spell, but which [[Elminster Aumar]] mimed behind him, almost certainly indicating that Thauvas was under Elminster's control.
